<xs:schema elementFormDefault="unqualified" targetNamespace="http://roomplanner/" version="1.0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:element name="doPlan" type="tns:doPlan"/> <xs:element name="doPlanResponse" type="tns:doPlanResponse"/> <xs:element name="getStatus" type="tns:getStatus"/> <xs:element name="getStatusResponse" type="tns:getStatusResponse"/> <xs:complexType name="getStatus"> <xs:sequence/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="getStatusResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="status" type="tns:status"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="status"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="uptime" type="xs:long"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="requestsServed" type="xs:long"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="doPlan"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="license" type="tns:license"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="roomList" type="tns:room"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="roomCategoryList" type="tns:roomCategory"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="reservationList" type="tns:reservation"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="roomAssignmentList" type="tns:roomAssignment"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="priceList" type="tns:pricelist"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="license"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="key" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="room"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="roomCategory" type="tns:roomCategory"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="adults" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="nonSmoking" type="xs:boolean"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="id" type="xs:long"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="roomCategory"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="name" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="id" type="xs:long"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="reservation"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="roomCategory" type="tns:roomCategory"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="bookingInterval" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="adults" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="nonSmoking" type="xs:boolean"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="id" type="xs:long"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="roomAssignment"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="room" type="tns:room"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="reservation" type="tns:reservation"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="moveable" type="xs:boolean"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="id" type="xs:long"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="pricelist"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="licenseId" type="xs:long"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="fromDate" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="toDate" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="items" type="tns:pricelistItem"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="pricelistItem"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="onDate" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="rate" type="xs:decimal"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="roomId" type="xs:long"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="doPlanResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="plan" type="tns:plan"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="plan"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="roomAssignments" type="tns:roomAssignment"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="score" type="tns:score"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="score"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="feasible" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="hardScoreConstraints" type="xs:double"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="softScoreConstraints" type="xs:double"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="scoreDetails" type="tns:scoreDetail"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="scoreDetail"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="constraintName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="roomAssignments" type="tns:roomAssignment"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="weight" type="xs:double"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="doPlan"> <wsdl:part element="tns:doPlan" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getStatusResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:getStatusResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getStatus"> <wsdl:part element="tns:getStatus" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="doPlanResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:doPlanResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="RoomPlannerSoapService"> <wsdl:operation name="getStatus"> <wsdl:input message="tns:getStatus" name="getStatus"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:getStatusResponse" name="getStatusResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="doPlan"> <wsdl:input message="tns:doPlan" name="doPlan"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:doPlanResponse" name="doPlanResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="RoomPlannerSoapServiceServiceSoapBinding" type="tns:RoomPlannerSoapService"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="getStatus"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="getStatus"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="getStatusResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="doPlan"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="doPlan"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="doPlanResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="RoomPlannerSoapServiceService"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:RoomPlannerSoapServiceServiceSoapBinding" name="RoomPlannerSoapServicePort"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8080/RoomPlanner/services/roomPlannerSoap"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<license> <key>XXXXX-XXXXX-XXXXX-XXXXX-XXXXX</key> </license>
<!--Room Categories--> <roomCategoryList id="1"/> <roomCategoryList id="2"/> <roomCategoryList id="3"/> <roomCategoryList id="4"/> <roomCategoryList id="5"/>

<!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <reservationList id="1"> <roomCategory id="1"/> <bookingInterval>10000-20000</bookingInterval> <adults>2</adults> </reservationList> <reservationList id="2"> <roomCategory id="2"/> <bookingInterval>10000-20000</bookingInterval> <adults>3</adults> </reservationList> <reservationList id="3"> <roomCategory id="3"/> <bookingInterval>10000-20000</bookingInterval> <adults>1</adults> </reservationList> <reservationList id="4"> <roomCategory id="4"/> <bookingInterval>10000-20000</bookingInterval> <adults>3</adults> </reservationList> <reservationList id="5"> <roomCategory id="5"/> <bookingInterval>10000-20000</bookingInterval> <adults>4</adults> </reservationList>
